'''''Risk: The Lord of the Rings: The Middle-earth Conquest Game''''' is a modification of ''[[wikipedia:Risk (game)|Risk]]'', published in [[2002]] by Hasbro. It serves as merchandise to [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]].
